attributes.action: To give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood - and now not later !
attributes.additional_details:
Captain Tom has served his country twice. Once during the last major emergency to beset this country (World War II) and he is serving his country again now.
Dont wait until next year or debate and pontificate - do it now, he is 99 years old.
attributes.background: I want the Government to request the Queen honour Captains Tom's fundraising efforts during this national emergency with a Knighhood or higher.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
